tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
  weather_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  wind_speed FLOAT,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  country VARCHAR(100),
  forecast_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  temperature DOUBLE PRECISION,
  humidity DOUBLE PRECISION,
  wind_speed DOUBLE PRECISION
);

CREATE TABLE GeographicInformation (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  latitude DOUBLE PRECISION,
  longitude DOUBLE PRECISION,
  elevation DOUBLE PRECISION
);

CREATE TABLE ForecastData (
    forecast_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    forecast_date DATE,
    forecast_type VARCHAR(255),
    high_temperature FLOAT,
    low_temperature FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  city VARCHAR(50),
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  wind_speed FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE geographic_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  city VARCHAR(50),
  country_code VARCHAR(2),
  latitude DECIMAL(9,6),
  longitude DECIMAL(9,6)
);

CREATE TABLE forecast (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  city VARCHAR(50),
  date DATE,
  forecast_description VARCHAR(100),
  temperature_low FLOAT,
  temperature_high FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE weather_updates (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  city VARCHAR(50),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  weather_condition VARCHAR(50),
  precipitation FLOAT
);
